report.title: EU Pollinator Fixed Square Results Occurrences
report.description: List of occurrences for the fixed square survey (also supports My Own Data Only, and Regional Coodinator functionality).
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = csf.id JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = cof.id JOIN locations square on square.id = csf.location_id AND square.location_type_id = #1km_square_location_type_id# AND square.deleted = false JOIN location_attribute_values country_code_attr_val on country_code_attr_val.location_id = square.id AND country_code_attr_val.location_attribute_id = #country_code_loc_attr_id# AND country_code_attr_val.deleted = false JOIN locations country on country.code = country_code_attr_val.text_value AND country.location_type_id = #country_location_type_id# AND country.deleted = false #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND csf.survey_id = #survey_id# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date)))

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: survey_id
param.description: ID of the pan trap count survey.

param.name: country_code_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that holds the country code for an 1km location.

param.name: 1km_square_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for 1km Squares.

param.name: country_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for countries.

param.name: floral_unit_occ_attr_id
param.description: ID of the floral unit occurrence attribute.

param.name: number_of_floral_units_occ_attr_id
param.display: Number Of Floral Units occurrence attr ID
param.description: ID of the floral unit number occurrence attribute.

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of sample IDs to filter to.
